title: Linea by Umberto Fenocchio (1966-1969)
content:
Hi.  
I’m looking for information about Linea, a sanserif typeface by Aldo Umberto Fenocchio designed in 1966-69 while Fenocchio serving as the art director at the Fonderia Tipografica Cooperativa.Its considered similar Univers in Italy. Does anyone have information about this typeface? images? typespecimen?

thanks ¡¡
author: marcosdopico

comments.content: You might get responses posting this in the general category, rather than here in critiques, since you don't want a critique of something you've designed.

Marcos: sadly the only reference of Linea I've stumbled upon is here: [http://blog.giofugatype.com/?p=37](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414190838/http:/blog.giofugatype.com/?p=37 "http://blog.giofugatype.com/?p=37"). There is a small image there, but nothing else. I suppose you've already found it, but anyway...
